data.title: International English Language Requirements
data.text:
Test Undergraduate degrees Postgraduate degrees A level (A2) C grade or above in A2 English language C grade or above in A2 English language AS level (A1) C grade or above in AS English language C grade or above in AS English language GCSE English/ GCE O level/ iGCSE C/4 or above C/4 or above Irish Leaving Certificate Grade C or above (ordinary) or at Grade D or above (higher) Grade C or above (ordinary) or at Grade D or above (higher) LanguageCert International ESOL (B2 Communicator Level)

*Test can be taken online or in-centre – please contact Admissions for an exclusive discount of test fees

B2 Pass with a minimum score of 33 in each skill B2 High Pass with a minimum score of 38 in each skill European Baccalaureate Grade 6 (80%) EL 85% International Baccalaureate HL English B at grade 4 or SL English A: Language & Literature or English A: Literature at grade 4 Same as undergraduate with evidence of continued use of English IELTS (International English Language Testing System) Academic version

*We may be able to accept IELTS Indicators taken from 1st July 2020 onwards

Min. 6.0 overall with no less than 5.5 in each element: Listening, Reading, Speaking and Writing Min 6.5 with no less than 6.0 in each element: Listening, Reading, Speaking and Writing overall TOEFL (iBT) and Home Edition

*We do not accept TOEFL ITP tests available in China

Min. 72 overall with 18 in Reading, 17 in Writing, 17 in Listening and 20 in Speaking Min. 83 overall with 19 in Reading, 24 in Writing, 20 in Listening and 20 in Speaking Pearson Test of English Academic (PTE Academic)

We cannot accept PTE Academic Online.

Min. 59 overall with no less than 59 in each element Min. 62 overall with no less than 59 in each element Cambridge Certificate of Proficiency in English (CPE) 170 overall with 165 in each component 170 overall with 165 in each component Cambridge Advanced Certificate in English (CAE) 170 overall with 165 in each component 170 overall with 165 in each component British bachelor’s degree 2:2 or above* 2:2 or above Trinity ISE 2 Pass with Merit Pass with Distinction
